helper.title: How does the app work?
helper.body:
1. Item draw:
- Create lists of elements (characters, adventures, etc).
- To draw, click the draw button.
- The draw is WEIGHTED: items with higher weight have more chance.

2. Weighted chances:
- Each item has a 'weight' field (integer).
- The calculation sums all weights.
- Probability is proportional to weight. Example:
Aragorn (10), Gandalf (5), Frodo (2):
Total: 17
Aragorn: 10/17 â‰ˆ 59%
Gandalf: 5/17 â‰ˆ 29%
Frodo: 2/17 â‰ˆ 12%

3. List references:
- Use 'LIST_REF:ListName' to reference another list.
- The app fetches the result from the referenced list.

4. JSON examples for upload:
{
  "Personagens": [
    { "nome": "Aragorn", "peso": 10 },
    { "nome": "Gandalf", "peso": 5 },
    { "nome": "Frodo", "peso": 2 }
  ],
  "Aventuras": [
    { "nome": "LIST_REF:Personagens", "peso": 1 },
    { "nome": "MissÃ£o Secreta", "peso": 3 }
  ]
}

Single list (paste only):
[
  { "nome": "Aragorn", "peso": 10 },
  { "nome": "Gandalf", "peso": 5 },
  { "nome": "Frodo", "peso": 2 }
]
